mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.forcerNo as "forcerNo", a.forcerName as "forcerName", a.isDisable as "isDisable", a.userId as "userId", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.macAddress as "macAddress", a.linkMan as "linkMan", a.linkPhone as "linkPhone", a.kfId as "kfId", a.sjkfId as "sjkfId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM h_forcer_info a
1 = 1
AND a.macAddress=#{macAddress}
